sections.paragraph: + A Reubenite, ancestor of Bela. (1 Chronicles 5:8) (B.C. before 1090.) + Son of Elpaal. (1 Chronicles 8:13) Probably the same as Shimhi. (B.C. after 1450.) + One of those who stood at Ezra's right hand when he read the law to the people. (Nehemiah 8:4) (B.C. 458.) + (Joshua 15:26) [[1100]Sheba]
